sentence.Network_en: Cancellation charges will apply in accordance with paragraph 4 above.
sentence.Network_cn: 按照上面第四节条款内容应该支付注销费.

sentence.Network_en: One's opinion tends to differ in accordance with one's standpoint.
sentence.Network_cn: 不同的立场势必形成不同的见解.

sentence.Network_en: She was dismissed in accordance with the company's usual displinary procedures.
sentence.Network_cn: 按照公司一般纪律程序,她被解雇了.

accord vi.&n. 一致accordance n. 一致，和谐By
accord vt. 使一致;给予accordance n. 一致;和谐;授予accordingly ad. 因此,所以;照着

list.abs: 巴塞尔协议(Basel Accord)，全名是资本充足协议(Capital Accord) [编辑] 什么是巴塞尔协议巴塞尔协议的主要内容巴塞尔协议概述
根据哥本哈根协议（Copenhagen Accord），到2012年，承诺给予贫困国家的300亿美元必须到位，以帮助其降低碳排放，应对气候 …
大学英语四级常用词组 ... according as 根据…而… according to 根据…所说；按照 account for 说明(原因等)；解释.
广场协议(Plaza Accord)是20世纪80年代初期，美国财政赤字剧增，对外贸易逆差大幅增长。美国希望通过美元贬值来增加产品的出口 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : from Old French acordance, from acorder 'bring to an agreement' (see accord)

entry.def: If something is done in accordance with a particular rule or system, it is done in the way that the rule or system says that it should be done.

example.ex: Entries which are not in accordance with the rules will be disqualified.
example.tran: 不符合规定的参赛作品将被取消资格。

sentences.sentence: "we are in accord with your proposal"
"the accordance to Canada of rights of access"

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Everything happens gradually, in accordance with Divine laws.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 相符的, 一致的, 根据……而定的
stems_affixes.word_buile: accord[n.&v.一致;符合]+ing形容词→adj.相符的, 一致的, 根据……而定的
cord心脏,一致+ial……的→adj.首要的,主要的
accord[n.&v.一致;符合]+ance表名词→n.一致,和谐,符合
cordial[adj.首要的,主要的]+ity表名词→n.诚心,热诚
discord[n.不和;不一致]+ance表名词→n.不协调;　不一致
ac加强+cord心脏,一致→心心相符
re一再+cord心脏,一致→一再放在心上→记录

means.word_mean: 一致, 和谐, 符合

sentences.en: He acted in accordance with his beliefs.
sentences.cn: 他按照自己的信念行事。
